dataSource.script:
select
adj.name,
adj_billing_system.ADJUSTMENT_SEQ as SEQ,
ltrim(to_char(adj_billing_system.ADJUSTMENT_NET_MNY / 10000,'999999990')) AS AMOUNT,
adj_type.ADJUSTMENT_TYPE_NAME AS TYPE,
DECODE(adj_billing_system.ADJUSTMENT_STATUS,             1, 'Pending',             2, 'Cancelled',             3, 'Approved',             4, 'Rejected',             5, 'Not billed') as STATUS,
adj_billing_system.CREATED_DTM as Created_Date
from
(select adj.object_id, seq.value as seq, adj.name, (select p.value
from nc_params p where p.object_id = adj.parent_id and p.attr_id = 9134741028613213648) as account_num
from nc_objects adj
JOIN nc_params seq on seq.object_id = adj.object_id and seq.attr_id = 9135500263813532281 /*Adjustment Seq*/
where adj.object_type_id = 9135500263813532251 /*Adjustment*/ and adj.parent_id in (select object_id from nc_objects where parent_id in( ${Customer_ID}/*Customer Id*/) and object_type_id in (9135697671913322790,9135697671913322818)) order by SEQ) adj
left join ADJUSTMENT@billing_system_dblink adj_billing_system on adj_billing_system.ACCOUNT_NUM = adj.ACCOUNT_NUM and adj_billing_system.ADJUSTMENT_SEQ= adj.seq
JOIN ADJUSTMENTTYPE@billing_system_dblink adj_type ON adj_type.ADJUSTMENT_TYPE_ID = adj_billing_system.ADJUSTMENT_TYPE_ID

select ''||adj.name||'' as ADJ_NAME, adj.seq, adj.name, amount.value as amount, type_o.name as type, SUBSTR(status_list.value,INSTR(status_list.value, '$')+1) as status, create_date.DATE_VALUE as Created_Date from (select adj.object_id, seq.value as seq, adj.name from nc_objects adj JOIN nc_params seq on seq.object_id = adj.object_id and seq.attr_id = 9135500263813532281 /*Adjustment Seq*/ where adj.object_type_id = 9135500263813532251 /*Adjustment*/ and adj.parent_id in (select object_id from nc_objects where parent_id = ${Customer_ID}/*Customer Id*/ and object_type_id in (9135697671913322790,9135697671913322818)) order by SEQ) adj left join nc_params amount on amount.object_id = adj.object_id and amount.attr_id=9135500469613532487 left join nc_params create_date on create_date.object_id = adj.object_id and create_date.attr_id=62 left join nc_params status on status.object_id = adj.object_id and status.attr_id=9135500469613532495 left join nc_list_values status_list on status_list.LIST_VALUE_ID = status.LIST_VALUE_ID left join nc_references type on type.object_id = adj.object_id and type.attr_id=9135500469613532479 left join nc_objects type_o on type_o.object_id = type.reference

select
ACCOUNT_PAYMENT_SEQ as SEQ,
o.name,
ACCOUNTPAYMENT.ACCOUNT_NUM,
REPLACE(PAYMENTMETHOD.PAYMENT_METHOD_NAME,'_',' ') AS PAYMENT_METHOD,
ltrim(to_char(ACCOUNT_PAYMENT_MNY  / 10000,'999999990D9')) AS PAYMENT_AMOUNT,
to_char(ACCOUNT_PAYMENT_DAT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS PAYMENT_DATE,
Case ACCOUNTPAYMENT.ACCOUNT_PAYMENT_STATUS when 0 then 'Pending Approval' when 1 then 'Posted' when 2 then 'Cancelled' when 3 then 'Failed' end AS PAYMENT_STATUS
from ACCOUNTPAYMENT@billing_system_dblink
JOIN ACCOUNT@billing_system_dblink ON ACCOUNT.ACCOUNT_NUM = ACCOUNTPAYMENT.ACCOUNT_NUM
JOIN PHYSICALPAYMENT@billing_system_dblink on PHYSICALPAYMENT.PHYSICAL_PAYMENT_SEQ = ACCOUNTPAYMENT.PHYSICAL_PAYMENT_SEQ and PHYSICALPAYMENT.CUSTOMER_REF = ACCOUNT.customer_ref
JOIN PAYMENTMETHOD@billing_system_dblink on PAYMENTMETHOD.PAYMENT_METHOD_ID = PHYSICALPAYMENT.PAYMENT_METHOD_ID
JOIN nc_params p on p.value = ACCOUNTPAYMENT.ACCOUNT_NUM and p.attr_id= 9134741028613213648 /* Billing Account Number */
JOIN nc_objects o on o.parent_id=p.object_id and o.object_type_id = 9135696689113320983 /*Billing Account Payment*/
join nc_params seq on seq.object_id = o.object_id and seq.attr_id = 9135696689113321004 /* Account Payment Sequence */ and seq.value=ACCOUNT_PAYMENT_SEQ
where PHYSICALPAYMENT.REFUND_BOO = 'F'
and ACCOUNTPAYMENT.ACCOUNT_NUM in (select p.value as ACCOUNT_NUM
from nc_objects o
join nc_objects s on s.parent_id=o.object_id
join nc_params p on p.object_id = s.object_id and p.attr_id = 9134741028613213648
where o.object_id IN (${Customer_ID}/*Customer Id*/)
)

select
ACCOUNT_PAYMENT_SEQ as SEQ,
o.name,
ACCOUNTPAYMENT.ACCOUNT_NUM,
REPLACE(PAYMENTMETHOD.PAYMENT_METHOD_NAME,'_',' ') AS PAYMENT_METHOD,
ltrim(to_char(ACCOUNT_PAYMENT_MNY  / 1000,'999999990D9')) AS PAYMENT_AMOUNT,
to_char(ACCOUNT_PAYMENT_DAT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS PAYMENT_DATE,
Case ACCOUNTPAYMENT.ACCOUNT_PAYMENT_STATUS when 0 then 'Pending Approval' when 1 then 'Posted' when 2 then 'Cancelled' when 3 then 'Failed' end AS PAYMENT_STATUS
from ACCOUNTPAYMENT@billing_system_dblink
JOIN ACCOUNT@billing_system_dblink ON ACCOUNT.ACCOUNT_NUM = ACCOUNTPAYMENT.ACCOUNT_NUM
JOIN PHYSICALPAYMENT@billing_system_dblink on PHYSICALPAYMENT.PHYSICAL_PAYMENT_SEQ = ACCOUNTPAYMENT.PHYSICAL_PAYMENT_SEQ and PHYSICALPAYMENT.CUSTOMER_REF = ACCOUNT.customer_ref
JOIN PAYMENTMETHOD@billing_system_dblink on PAYMENTMETHOD.PAYMENT_METHOD_ID = PHYSICALPAYMENT.PAYMENT_METHOD_ID
JOIN nc_params p on p.value = ACCOUNTPAYMENT.ACCOUNT_NUM and p.attr_id= 9134741028613213648 /* Billing Account Number */
JOIN nc_objects o on o.parent_id=p.object_id and o.object_type_id = 9135696689113320983 /*Billing Account Payment*/
join nc_params seq on seq.object_id = o.object_id and seq.attr_id = 9135696689113321004 /* Account Payment Sequence */ and seq.value=ACCOUNT_PAYMENT_SEQ
where PHYSICALPAYMENT.REFUND_BOO = 'T'
and ACCOUNTPAYMENT.ACCOUNT_NUM in (select p.value as ACCOUNT_NUM
from nc_objects o
join nc_objects s on s.parent_id=o.object_id
join nc_params p on p.object_id = s.object_id and p.attr_id = 9134741028613213648
where o.object_id IN (${Customer_ID}/*Customer Id*/)
)

select
bpis.name,
cptd.PRODUCT_SEQ as SEQ,
ltrim(to_char(teb.RECURRING_NUMBER / 10000,'999999990D99')) AS MRC
from (with bpis as (SELECT nco.object_id, nco.name FROM nc_objects nco
    START WITH nco.object_id  in (select o.object_id from nc_objects o
              JOIN nc_params p ON p.object_id = o.object_id and p.attr_id = 9141504139913676255 /*Billing Status*/
              where o.object_type_id = 9126083628313449001 /*Business Product Instance*/
               and p.LIST_VALUE_ID != 9141504170013676280/*Terminated*/
               and o.parent_id in (select object_id from nc_objects
                      where parent_id = ${Customer_ID} /*Customer Id*/
                        and object_type_id = 4071945839013823002 /*Customer Business Solution*/))
              CONNECT BY PRIOR nco.object_id = nco.parent_id and nco.object_type_id = 9126083628313449001)
select bpis.*, seq.value as seq, (select value from nc_params
where  nc_params.object_id = ${Customer_ID} and
attr_id = 2091641841013994123) as customer_ref
from bpis
  JOIN nc_references po ON po.object_id = bpis.object_id and po.attr_id = 9126099920013458621 /*Product Offering*/
  JOIN nc_objects poo ON poo.object_id = po.reference and poo.object_type_id != 9140129238613601812 /*OTC*/
  JOIN nc_params seq ON seq.object_id = bpis.object_id and seq.attr_id = 9135284080613451078 /*Seq*/)
bpis
left join CUSTPRODUCTTARIFFDETAILS@billing_system_dblink cptd
on cptd.customer_ref = bpis.customer_ref and cptd.PRODUCT_SEQ = bpis.seq
left join TARIFFELEMENTBAND@billing_system_dblink teb on teb.TARIFF_ID = cptd.TARIFF_ID

select ''||bpis.name||'' as PRICE_NAME, bpis.name, bpis.seq, mrc.value AS MRC from (with bpis as (SELECT nco.object_id, nco.name FROM nc_objects nco START WITH nco.object_id in (select o.object_id from nc_objects o JOIN nc_params p ON p.object_id = o.object_id and p.attr_id = 9141504139913676255 /*Billing Status*/ where o.object_type_id = 9126083628313449001 /*Business Product Instance*/ and p.LIST_VALUE_ID != 9141504170013676280/*Terminated*/ and o.parent_id in (select object_id from nc_objects where parent_id = ${Customer_ID} /*Customer Id*/ and object_type_id = 4071945839013823002 /*Customer Business Solution*/)) CONNECT BY PRIOR nco.object_id = nco.parent_id and nco.object_type_id = 9126083628313449001) select bpis.*, seq.value as seq, (select value from nc_params where nc_params.object_id = ${Customer_ID} and attr_id = 2091641841013994123) as customer_ref from bpis JOIN nc_references po ON po.object_id = bpis.object_id and po.attr_id = 9126099920013458621 /*Product Offering*/ JOIN nc_objects poo ON poo.object_id = po.reference and poo.object_type_id != 9140129238613601812 /*OTC*/ JOIN nc_params seq ON seq.object_id = bpis.object_id and seq.attr_id = 9135284080613451078 /*Seq*/) bpis left join nc_params mrc on mrc.object_id = bpis.object_id and mrc.attr_id= 9144424187313847843

select
bpis.name,
bpis.seq,
ltrim(to_char(ahotc.OTC_MNY / 10000,'999999990D99')) AS NRC
from (with bpis as (SELECT nco.object_id, nco.name FROM nc_objects nco
    START WITH nco.object_id  in (select o.object_id from nc_objects o
              JOIN nc_params p ON p.object_id = o.object_id and p.attr_id = 9141504139913676255 /*Billing Status*/
              where o.object_type_id = 9126083628313449001 /*Business Product Instance*/
               and p.LIST_VALUE_ID != 9141504170013676280/*Terminated*/
               and o.parent_id in (select object_id from nc_objects
                      where parent_id = ${Customer_ID} /*Customer Id*/
                        and object_type_id = 4071945839013823002 /*Customer Business Solution*/))
              CONNECT BY PRIOR nco.object_id = nco.parent_id and nco.object_type_id = 9126083628313449001)
select bpis.*, seq.value as seq, (select p.value
from nc_references r, nc_attributes a, nc_params p
where a.attr_id = r.attr_id and r.object_id = bpis.object_id
and p.object_id = r.REFERENCE and p.attr_id = 9134741028613213648) as account_num
from bpis
  JOIN nc_references po ON po.object_id = bpis.object_id and po.attr_id = 9126099920013458621 /*Product Offering*/
  JOIN nc_objects poo ON poo.object_id = po.reference and poo.object_type_id = 9140129238613601812 /*OTC*/
  JOIN nc_params seq ON seq.object_id = bpis.object_id and seq.attr_id = 9155786877713090858 /*Seq*/)
bpis
left join acchasonetimecharge@billing_system_dblink ahotc on ahotc.OTC_SEQ = bpis.seq and ahotc.account_num = bpis.account_num

select ''||bpis.name||'' as OTC_NAME, bpis.name, bpis.seq, nrc.value AS NRC from (with bpis as (SELECT nco.object_id, nco.name FROM nc_objects nco START WITH nco.object_id in (select o.object_id from nc_objects o JOIN nc_params p ON p.object_id = o.object_id and p.attr_id = 9141504139913676255 /*Billing Status*/ where o.object_type_id = 9126083628313449001 /*Business Product Instance*/ and p.LIST_VALUE_ID != 9141504170013676280/*Terminated*/ and o.parent_id in (select object_id from nc_objects where parent_id = ${Customer_ID} /*Customer Id*/ and object_type_id = 4071945839013823002 /*Customer Business Solution*/)) CONNECT BY PRIOR nco.object_id = nco.parent_id and nco.object_type_id = 9126083628313449001) select bpis.*, seq.value as seq, (select value from nc_params where nc_params.object_id = ${Customer_ID} and attr_id = 2091641841013994123) as customer_ref from bpis JOIN nc_references po ON po.object_id = bpis.object_id and po.attr_id = 9126099920013458621 /*Product Offering*/ JOIN nc_objects poo ON poo.object_id = po.reference and poo.object_type_id = 9140129238613601812 /*OTC*/ JOIN nc_params seq ON seq.object_id = bpis.object_id and seq.attr_id = 9155786877713090858 /*Seq*/) bpis left join nc_params nrc on nrc.object_id = bpis.object_id and nrc.attr_id= 9153847037413262139
